content:
Based on the execution logs, I'll generate a report summarizing the existing structures and error tips.

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Area (Position x=0-2, y=0)
Consists of two stone furnaces working in parallel:
- Stone furnace 1 at (0,0) processing iron ore into plates
- Stone furnace 2 at (2,0) processing iron ore into plates
Both furnaces are fueled by coal and actively working

### Copper Plate Production (Position x=4, y=4)
Single stone furnace processing copper ore into copper plates
- Stone furnace at (4,4) fueled by coal and actively working

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line (Position x=6.5-12.5, y=11.5)
Complex production line consisting of:
- Input chest at (6.5, 11.5) storing iron plates and copper cables
- Burner inserter at (7.5, 11.5) moving materials from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at (9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at (11.5, 11.5) moving finished products
- Output chest at (12.5, 11.5) storing completed electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (Position x=-9.5 to -2.5, y=22.5-26.5)
Steam power setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) extracting water
- Pipe network connecting water flow
- Boiler at (-7.0, 24.5) converting water to steam
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Connected to electrical pole network

### Research Facility (Position x=0.5, y=28.5-31.5)
Science pack handling system:
- Lab (position not directly specified but connected to power)
- Burner inserter at (0.5, 30.5) for loading science packs
- Storage chest at (0.5, 31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Issues
- Keep monitoring and maintaining fuel levels in boilers to prevent "out of fuel" warnings
- Ensure all burner inserters have sufficient coal supply

### Resource Shortages in Assembly
- Electronic circuit production is frequently experiencing copper cable shortages
- Maintain steady supply of ingredients to prevent ITEM_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE status
- Consider balancing the input ratios of iron plates and copper cables

### Production Flow
- Monitor and maintain proper ratios of materials in input chests
- Ensure consistent supply chain from raw materials to final products
